speaker: Sableglass Dunes
line: Dark sand drifts over ice like ink spilled on a frozen page. Each step leaves a mark too crisp to trust.

speaker: Shards
line: Tiny glass flecks sing when the wind lifts them. It sounds like distant chimes being broken.

speaker: Your Journal
line: Here, direction is a guess. Purpose helps.

choices.text: Hunt for the next contract among the dunes.
Mark Sableglass Dunes as a checkpoint.

speaker: Sableglass Dunes
line: The wind erases your trail, but not the feeling that someone could redraw it.
